titleStmt.title: Articles whereupon it was agreed by the archbishoppes and bishoppes of both prouinces and the whole cleargie, in the conuocation holden at London in the yere of our Lorde God. 1562. according to the computation of the Churche of Englande for the auoiding of the diuersities of opinions, and for the stablishyng of consent touching true religion. Put foorth by the Queenes aucthoritie.
Thirty-nine Articles. English
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

titleStmt.title: Articles whereupon it was agreed by the archbishoppes and bishoppes of both prouinces and the whole cleargie, in the conuocation holden at London in the yere of our Lorde God. 1562. according to the computation of the Churche of Englande for the auoiding of the diuersities of opinions, and for the stablishyng of consent touching true religion. Put foorth by the Queenes aucthoritie.
Thirty-nine Articles. English
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Poules Churchyard, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, A2r line 2 of heading has "fayth" and line 6 of text has "wysedome".
The sixth item on UMI microfilm reel 422 identified as STC 10036a; identified as STC 10039 on reel 341.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 341 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reels 422 and 1752 (British Library copy).
